alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 1:34PM MST until February 19 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches with up to 8 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains, Little Belt and Highwood Mountains and Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous over some mountain passes Saturday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains
